content.question: The wild-type allele encodes a GA3H enzyme with alanine (Ala), a nonpolar amino acid, at position 229. The mutant allele encodes a GA3H enzyme with a threonine (Thr), a polar amino acid, at position 229. Describe the effect of the mutation on the enzyme and provide reasoning to support how this mutation results in a short plant phenotype in homozygous recessive plants.

frqParts.text: The wild-type allele encodes a GA3H enzyme with alanine (Ala), a nonpolar amino acid, at position 229.
